reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app collects personal information and differentiates it into voluntarily provided information and automatically collected information.
reply.reference: Information we collect falls into one of two categories: 'voluntarily provided' information and 'automatically collected' information. URL: https://soarhealthapp.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects personal information such as name and email address.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly mentions that the app may collect personal information like name and email address.

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that personal information is collected and processed based on legitimate reasons, which are essential for providing the services. It also states that personal information is used for specific purposes and will not be further processed in an incompatible manner.
reply.reference: We consider “user-generated content” to be materials (image and/or video content) voluntarily supplied to us by our users for the purpose of taking advantage of the Service’s image-generation functions. All user-generated content is associated with the account or email address used to submit the materials. Legitimate Reasons for Processing Your Personal Information We only collect and use your personal information when we have a legitimate reason for doing so. In which instance, we only collect personal information that is reasonably necessary to provide our services to you. Collection and Use of Information We may collect personal information from you when you do any of the following on our website or mobile application service: We may collect, hold, use, and disclose information for the following purposes, and personal information will not be further processed in a manner that is incompatible with these purposes: We may combine voluntarily-provided and automatically collected personal information with general information or research data we receive from other trusted sources. URL: https://soarhealthapp.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that users have the right to delete their personal information under specific circumstances and also provides a process to opt-out of communications and marketing.

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that personal information may be disclosed to third parties, indicating that the app shares data with third parties.
reply.reference: We may disclose personal information to: Third parties we currently use include: International Transfers of Personal Information. URL: https://soarhealthapp.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with third parties, including partners, affiliates, and third-party providers.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that personal information may be disclosed to third parties such as partners, affiliates, and third-party providers. These entities are categorized as the third parties with whom the app shares data.
